title: Return of the Dragon Slayers
description: The magical world teeters on the brink of collapse. The Dragon King, Celebrant, has united the dragons into a vengeful army, and only a final artifact stands in the way of them unleashing their fury against humankind. With established allegiances shifting under the strain, Seth and Kendra find themselves in desperate need of new allies.Seth must face his most dangerous quest yetâ€”the fulfillment of his pledge to the Singing Sisters. With only Calvin the Tiny Hero at his side, Seth needs to collect the pieces of the Ethergem. Halfway across the world, Kendra finds herself torn between her duty to Dragonwatch and her desire to rescue Bracken.For the defenders of light to stand a chance, the legendary Dragon Slayers must arise, lost secrets must be uncovered, and ancient powers must awaken.Get ready for the gripping, revelatory, and unforeseen conclusion to the epic ten-volume New York Times best-selling Fablehaven and Dragonwatch series.
author: Brandon Mull
